website_summaries.verdict: A little goes a long way with this very effective yet budget-friendly laundry detergent.
pros: Uses plant-based enzymes for nonionic cleaning, with very small amounts of mineral stabilizers
Drip-free pump reduces mess and accurately dispenses the amount of detergent needed
Cleans clothing thoroughly, removes stains and odors
cons: Hot water reduces the enzymes’ efficacy, so clothes must be washed in warm or cool water only

website_summaries.verdict: A little goes a long way with this plant-based laundry detergent, which was formulated by doctors.
pros: Contains no sulfates, bleach, or toxic chemicals
Acceptable for delicates and darks, with no perfumes, dyes, or allergens
Several users with skin allergies have had no problems with this product
cons: Some people dislike the lingering smell on clothes after washing

customer_reviews.title: Having a background in chemistry I can verify that this ...
customer_reviews.text: Having a background in chemistry I can verify that this detergent uses only the most gentle nonionic surfactants available, yet still cleans clothing as well as any other detergent i've used in the past. If you have skin issues, this detergent is for you.
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Toxic!
customer_reviews.text: It literally burned my baby’s skin (pic). I thought it was a food allergy but as soon as I switched to another brand his skin cleared up.
customer_reviews.author: kiai

customer_reviews.title: TOXIX WASTE DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my baby and used it on his clothes when he was in the NICU and up until I decided to read a review on this company’s actual baby detergent. I researched this myself as well and I am completely disgusted. The EWG rates this product an F because they use toxic chemicals that can cause reproductive damage to children while they are developing. I’m honestly contemplating suing Amazon for suggesting this to me. I want to vomit!
customer_reviews.author: Katie O.

customer_reviews.title: It works to a point.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it long enough to give this product a review. It is concentrated. This bottle will last! Two pumps for a front loader may be too much. Adjust and experiment. It does clean okay, but for some loads that are especially smelly, I had to add baking soda or the like. I did use the Puracy stain and odor remover, but it didn't help enough overall for the tough loads.
customer_reviews.author: KatAttack

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this because it was recommended on a cloth diaper website. It really works! Better than any other detergent I've used! Everyone in my family has sensitive skin, and this very gentle. But it really cleans cloth diapers well, including getting out yucky poopy stains. I do laundry a lot, almost everyday. And one container lasts a month using the max amount of pumps (4 pumps per load). We'll be using this for years! My only gripe is that I wish the scented version would come back in stock, but that's just personal taste. The unscented works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Quantity recommendations are too small, count on using more.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle recommends just one pump for high efficiency washers, two pumps if extra dirty. In order to get my clothes clean, I'm having to use double that. And that includes laundry that's not all that dirty, like towels and sheets. My husband's work clothes, and any laundry from the pets, like muddy feet towels... forget it. I like this company, and love some of their other products, but this one just falls short.
customer_reviews.author: moose momTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: this shipment leaked a bit.  cleaning power is okay.
customer_reviews.text: been using this for a while now. this shipment a bottle leaked. it was not that bad, but got all over other stuff in the box. since I ran out, we went back to the typical ALL free etc, stuff and that is more powerful. BUT, we use this more natural product. I've found this requires warm water wash to be as effective as ALL. that is with our new HE machine and it's very stingy on water - so you may have better luck. we continue to buy for the natural approach is better for our groundwater.
customer_reviews.author: diydiy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean well and is expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and bought this with the hopes that it would be easier on my skin and on fabrics. This doesn't do much to remove stains or odors and it's pretty expensive compared to other detergents of a similar makeup. I've used this to wash spoiled dog bedding and the smells still lingered. It's an unscented product but sometimes my clothing does not smell clean. The detergent is also useless on deodorant stains or caked on residue too. I've washed whites with ketchup or other food stains and they came out of the washing machine still dirty. This was a disappointing product and I will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: MusicfanTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Dries out your clothes & towels
customer_reviews.text: It's not like it doesn't clean, though depending on how big the load was/how thick the material is sometimes we would get a musky smell like it didn't clean all the way. But the big issue I have with it is that it really dried out the fibers of everything I washed & my clothe/ towels felt hard & abrasive. Even my softest clothes became hard & scratchy. While I'm thankful it didn't make me break out, I cannot use fabric softener so this was a big deal breaker for me. So disappointed this didn't work out...
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Oye

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy to have found this detergent. I’ve been searching for a non-scented, chemical free detergent that ACTUALLY CLEANS for several years. I’ve tried reputable brands: Seventh Generation, Ecos, Traders Joes brand, etc. Yet, felt like clothes never were clean. From my first load I noticed one specific undershirt no longer had lingering underarm marks. Even gentle enough to use on my undergarments. Clothes smell clean without any fake scent. I’ll be re-ordering and already recommended to a friend with very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Clean looking but still smelly...
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job on stains (really, really good on stains in fact) but was lackluster in removing smells. I could still smell deodorant left over on shirts, workout clothing kept their sweaty smell, etc. I tried increasing the amount I used per load but didn’t help. I’ll continue to use as a spot treatment on stains til it is gone but won’t repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen White

customer_reviews.title: Didn't clean clothes that well
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural laundry detergent and thought I'd give this a try. Seemed ok, until I noticed it doesn't clean certain bodily fluid stains very well... This is TMI but let's just say it doesn't do a good job with a pregnant woman's undies. Had to run some through another cycle with my boyfriend's Tide to get them clean.
customer_reviews.author: twinkiewarfare

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way with this natural laundry detergent! And it makes all my laundry feel so much softer. I'm also not seeing any white marks on dark clothing either which is a huge frustration to me with other detergents. I have a large family and do a lot of laundry - I only wish this product had been around years ago when my youngest daughter developed a skin rash to perfumed products. I also have a son that has disabilities and has epilepsy, so I'm always looking for more natural products. I will definitely continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J. Haak

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to wash baby clothes as I appreciated the minimal and gentle ingredients used. However it arrived with the plastic covering ripped open and without an actual pump, which was extremely disappointing to me. As I tried to use it yesterday while doing laundry and just used the cap to pour in the detergent it obviously leaked down the bottle etc. Very misleading as a big reason why I bought this product was due to the fl oz size and how you only need to use 1 or 2 pumps per load, yet I can't pump anything without an actual pump.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rosen

customer_reviews.title: My Holy Grail
customer_reviews.text: My new holy grail laundry soap. Has the enzymes and cleaning power I desire. The clothes come out absolutely scent free which is perfect for sensitive skin, babies, etc. The only downfall is the detergent leaks from the bottle. I just transfer it to a different container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Concentrated and Cleans
customer_reviews.text: One of these bottles of Laundry Detergent cleans load after load of laundry of any description very well, eliminating food stains and odors completely. I have used it exclusively for almost two years and I am very pleased to have found the product when looking for a detergent that would soothe a sensitive skin. It did that plus everything else I wanted a prime detergent to do. Thank you Puracy.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: Clean ingredients, long lasting product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite laundry detergent on the planet. I do two loads of laundry per week (it’s just me in the house) with two pumps per load with 3 drops of lavender and 3 drops of lemon doterra essential oils. This bottle lasts me just under a year. I follow up with the same oils on my dryer balls. I love the fresh smell of my clothes! Traditional detergents have too strong of smells and too much toxic chemicals for me!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: This will be my new favorite laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I've been a customer of Puracy for a while now but this was my first time trying out their detergents. I expected nothing but quality based on my experiences with them so far, and I was NOT disappointed. I bought this specifically to wash my baby items, but I might end up completely switching to Puracy for washing everything else. The thing I like the most about it is how soft the clothes/sheets come out of the laundry after washing them with this! Try it and experience it for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: De Den

customer_reviews.title: This stuff sucks
customer_reviews.text: This stuff sucks at washing. It also smells weird. It does a horrible job at getting smells out and leaves my clothes with gunk still stuck on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cdizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great product--packaging issue?
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, and have purchased it over and over again. I am submitting this less than five-star review to let you know that The bottle that arrived today was damaged--the top of the cap came off--and the soap is leaking all over the packaging. Obviously, this is not the end of the world, but I wanted you to know about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: The smell is a bit funky compared to Tide or any other big brand, but these are all plant based and natural. My clothes came out clean, and as long as I put them in the dryer with my natural wool dryer balls my clothes didn’t smell funky like the detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Works well, bottle sucks
customer_reviews.text: We love this detergent since we tried it. The bottle leaks EVERYWHERE though. I had a huge puddle of this detergent under the bottle a few hours after using it the first time, but it's hard to catch since it doens't do it immediately. I have to pump the detergent out, wipe the nozzle off and then usually still wipe the counter later. I contacted the company about it and they were aware of the issue but offered me zero help. Therefore I dropped the star rating.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My baby has a very sensitive skin and we couldn’t find a laundry detergent that wouldn’t give him a rash until we fount Puracy. We use the same brand for body wash and shampoo. The scent may not be as nice as some other brands but they use organic products and no chemicals. This is what matters for a little one!
customer_reviews.author: Rachele

customer_reviews.title: Failed mission
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the laundry soap with one purpose. I had lingerie with fecal stains. They were new and I wanted them back. I go through periods of no warning and no control. Luckily it is only periodic. I purchased the stain remover and felt I must pair with the detergent. No success. It may work on something else. I'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Tse Tse Fly

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin sensitivities
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with Puracy products. This detergent doesn’t disappoint. None of the chemicals, all of the strength of a good detergent. A little goes a long way. I’ve had to move to clear detergents because of skin sensitivities and I’m much happier with this one than a grocery store brand. You can tell the company makes quality a top priority.
customer_reviews.author: suzi

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what to expect. Cleans fine. I do not need to use as many pumps as the bottle states for my standard washing machine. I do have to wear a glove on my left hand to prevent the soap dripping on my hand when using (I have extremely sensitive skin and in its full strength it will irritate my skin). I do not know if this is important, but our bottle has soap drippings from pumping, most likely because I have older kids who do their own laundry. But just a thought to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin, cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I got this detergent because my 6 month old broke out in a nasty rash and I think she’s allergic to the detergent we were using. It’s been a day and a half since switching and her rash is barely visible anymore. Not to mention this stuff has gotten out stains I didn’t expect would ever come out and left my cloth diapers smelling perfectly clean. The bottle did leak during shipping but it was wrapped in plastic so that contained the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Contact Dermatitis
customer_reviews.text: Not for those who don’t want to experience severe flare ups of contact dermatitis all over legs and arms. Literally using all mind control right now to not itch while typing this. The enzymes and thickener ingredients might be the culprit. Washed loads twice to double check if it’s this.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Good natural cleaner but could clean better
customer_reviews.text: It works okay. I usually use Tide but since I have an infant and needed detergent for her clothes I decided to get this and use it for the household laundry as well. Doesn't clean as well as Tide. Doesn't get rid of stains, like baby food, even with pretreatment to as directed. It will last a while and the 2 pumps does seem to clean decently. Don't think I'll continue to use for the household laundry but will use for baby clothes. Smells clean and fresh. Great that it's natural, especially for baby clothes.
customer_reviews.author: cawesome

customer_reviews.title: Natural concentrated product, but more work
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a detergent without a strong scent. One bottle lasts for a long time because it only requires two pumps per load. However, large loads like towels I use 3 pumps because I don’t feel they smell clean with just two. Dark clothes have to be turned inside out. And deodorant smell and stains don’t come out unless pre treated with stain remover before washing. This was never an issue when using Tide. The pump does leak at random every day. I just put a piece of paper towel under it to catch the drips.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to love this product. I love the packaging. It just doesn't work well. I have young kids and their clothes get really dirty. I can't tell you how many loads of laundry I've washed this detergent that had to be run through a second cycle because they still smelled dirty. This is a waste of time, water and money.
customer_reviews.author: ksquared

customer_reviews.title: Itch
customer_reviews.text: Terrible seniors with sensitive skin. Duke U Medical has found that the preservative you caused my wife skin allergies. Thi was confirmed when we tried it. It was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: WFF

customer_reviews.title: Still not clean
customer_reviews.text: Was excited when it arrived because I needed a good detergent to wash my daughter's clothes that were from daycare. I followed the directions on the labels and when it was finished we threw it in the dryer to dry. After it was dry and took it out from the dryer her clothes still smell like puke I was so disappointed never buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It works and I like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! No way you are going to get 96 loads out of the bottle, unless maybe you do a single pump per load, but it's very clarifying and such a pleasant, clean scent that I don't mind. The pump/spout also drips/oozes, but if you know it and wipe it down after use, it won't leave detergent rings on whatever you sit the bottle on.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product it had leaked in the packaging. When I used it in my HE washer reading the directions to a T I was disappointed. Laundry had no clean smell to it and it didn’t even look like it was washed. I personally wouldn’t recommend using this unless you wash one item🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Rypple

customer_reviews.title: Horrible red rashes everywhere on my  baby
customer_reviews.text: The worst , game my newborn horrible red rashes all over body .DO NOT USE . contacted babylist about this . This product is not for babies. Second I stopped using it rash went away
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Frankoski

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of container has a slow leak
customer_reviews.text: I like the product -- no smell and pump is very easy to use. My problem is with the slow leak of the container, so slow that I never noticed it at first. I initially thought it was just coming from the pump so I washed thoroughly the sides of the container each time. I came to the conclusion that iti's coming from the bottom of the container, but I can't be sure because the leak is so slow. So I need to keep the container in a small bowl (this is a very concentrated and it will leave marks on most surfaces). I remember seeing the same complaint on previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jim P

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent!!
customer_reviews.text: This laundry detergent is amazing!! Being a mom of 2 little ones, I've become more and more aware of the awful ingredients in personal care items. I can understand and trust the ingredients in Puracy products. This detergent is gentle and works great on all types of fabrics. I use this in combination with the Puracy stain remover for my kids clothes and they always come out clean! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Big let down.
customer_reviews.text: First off I want to start by saying I’m a big Puracy fan. There carpet cleaner and all purpose cleaner are great. That being said this stuff is absolutely worthless. Don’t waste your money. I even used twice the recommended dosage and my clothes smelt even worse after being washed than when they were dirty... you are better than this puracy...
customer_reviews.author: alicia1018

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. We do 3-5 loads of laundry per week ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. We do 3-5 loads of laundry per week and one bottle has lasted us over 6 months. I love the small bottle so I'm not lugging a huge gallon jug down stairs to the wash room. We don't have HE washers, but I usually use the HE amount of detergent anyway and my clothes get plenty clean. We do a lot of dark loads and haven't noticed any fading. I have somewhat sensitive skin and haven't had any issues and LOVE that it's unscented. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Peas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for us :-/
customer_reviews.text: Our washer is HE and I put waaaay more pumps than what is recommended and cloth still come dirty :( i reallly wanted it to work! We use their hand and dish soap with no problems and we love them though :)
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Stop measuring liquid detergent!
customer_reviews.text: I had to find an alternative to All Free and Clear since Costco is not my thing in Corona times. This works better and is more convenient. I love the eco formula and packaging and not having to measure detergent into a cup.
customer_reviews.author: Janel Harada

customer_reviews.title: careful with weird allergies
customer_reviews.text: I would LOVE to recommend this product. It's so convenient. Unfortunately, my wife has some unknown allergies to cleanser ingredients and this made her itchy. So far, the only detergent she csn use is Tide.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rose

customer_reviews.title: My low rent Trader Joe's plant-based detergent produced a better result than this "highly rated" detergent
customer_reviews.text: On certain products, sheets and towels, this product cleanses well. If you use 3 or 4 pumps. On work out clothes and heavy fabrics, forget about it. This liquid detergent has zero effect. I had to rewash my workout clothes with Tide, otherwise, risk being THAT guy at the gym. My low rent Trader Joe's plant-based detergent produced a better result than this "highly rated" detergent. Knocked off my reorder list!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: The best product!  Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: There are no "chemical smelling" fumes coming from my washer when I use this. I've tried another brand (Purex Free and Clear) and the Purex brand gave off an awful chemical smell coming from the washer as the clothes went through the various cycles. This gives me such peace of mind. Thank you Puracy!!!
customer_reviews.author: jane doe

customer_reviews.title: Good for urine
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It actually took the urine smell out of the kids bedding! Usually I always have to rely on Dreft. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: wyhawker

customer_reviews.title: Favorite natural detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent. It has a strong smell coming out of the bottle but even as a scent sensitive person it doesn’t bother me. This detergent cleans better then any other natural detergent I’ve used. It got stains out that have been in clothes for years and does an excellent job on our cloth diapers. One of our bottles did come with a broken pump but I just used the old pump.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Duane Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Does not fully clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the reviews. But when we used it for our family it never did get all of our stuff cleaned perfectly. We still had odor stains and found ourselves many times doubling up the dosage to try to get our clothes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mercer

customer_reviews.title: A "clean" laundry detergent with no added perfumes
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful! I am always looking for new, hypoallergenic products that won't irritate my children's skin and this laundry detergent is one for the books! There are no added perfumes and it left my laundry feeling really clean and soft. As an added bonus, I really appreciate that it's not tested on animals...I refuse to buy any products that were. I will definitely be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Shonda R Mace

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: There is not scent but it works great on my toddlers clothes. she has super sensitive skin and I got this due to not being able to get her regular laundry detergent. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi palbicki

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Baby due in 10 days, I know, i waited kind of late to wash all of her clothes, but I had to make sure her skin would NOT be irritated. So I did my research and found this little gem. It's a cleansing detergent, but does not leave a heavy scent or coating on clothes. Washed all of her clothes and blankets, etc. And barely made a dent in the bottle. So pleased I purchased. The dish soap for bottles and my breast pump.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Great results! I tested it with a load of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great results! I tested it with a load of regular clothes on cold and a load of towels on hot. Both came out great! Didn't leave my clothes stiff either after the dryer. I appreciate the functionality of this pump as someone who has a tendency to use too much product and is clumsy. I love the fact that this detergent has basically no scent to it either. It does what it's supposed to: wash my clothes, not covering them in chemicals so they can smell like a "meadow". I have been trying to switch to products that are more "pure" and are environmentally safe. I also have extremely sensitive skin and this product gave me no side affects whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Rothbacher

customer_reviews.title: My clothes smell terrible after this
customer_reviews.text: I HATE this laundry detergent. I've tried it over and over, thinking maybe I just need to tweak how I use it. Nope. I swear my clothes come out of the dryer smelling worse than before I washed them. Really frustrating, because I love Puracy and use a lot of their other products.
customer_reviews.author: ADBes

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This lasts forever and always gets our baby's clothes clean, even covered in spit up and when washed in cold water. No lasting odors. Highly recommend for newborns until you know if your baby is sensitive to normal detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Dubi

customer_reviews.title: Natural detergent that can handle my three boys mess
customer_reviews.text: When the bottle had first arrived the bottled had leaked some in transit. Puracy and Amazon were so amazing with customer service! The laundry detergent is just what I have been looking for! Dispensing the detergent is so easy and mess free! I have three boys and it can handle getting the stain out of their clothes! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: andrew barilla

customer_reviews.title: Pump leaks...
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm loving the product, but I wish my bottle wasn't always sitting in a ring of detergent even after just 1 load of wash. I come back and the ring is back. It's not a huge amount, but over time it's still wasteful, aside from the mess...
customer_reviews.author: RSM

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients and bottle design
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients. It’s hard to find a natural laundry detergent without any form of SLS in it for my sensitive skin. Love the concentration formula so the bottle is relatively small and easy to store. The pump on top is very helpful too
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: All natural soap wonder! Just keep a bag around the bottle because it leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I used twice as much as it recommends but it still lasts a long time. You get a great fresh smell and clean clothes. I'm switching to this for life. The only problem is the plastic bottles leak soap and so does the Puracy detergent bottle. It almost like it seeps through the plastic itself. Probably lose a good deal of bath soap that way but I put a bag around my detergent and not much seems to come out. Otherwise are giving this five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: We love this detergent! It takes very little of the liquid for a full load. The clothes smell great. They seem softer whether hang to dry or put in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Cove

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Free & Clear, Super Effective
customer_reviews.text: The pump idea for detergent is brilliant. It's free and clear, plant based, and actually cleans your clothes. Does not leave residue in the machine. People complain about the price, but I think it's worth it. This is very concentrated so you do not need much. If you have sensitive skin or babies, this is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: OCM

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the pump feature, it’s environmentally friendly and good for sensitive skin, however it lathers great at first but it’s not a lasting effect
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works well, no scent, good for sensitive skin, very concentrated.
customer_reviews.text: The unscented really is, with no odd after scent. Seems to get clothes clean, works well with all the household stuff & isn’t harsh. The pump bottle helps meter the amount used- without extra dripping or spillage. I have a lot of allergies & skin sensitivity, the Puracy definitely doesn’t irritate me at all! Just had to use it a few times to adjust the quantity needed for different loads because my washer is the super extra large HE type.
customer_reviews.author: E K

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful!  I would give it ten stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome product! This laundry soap works wonderfully. It cleans beautifully. If you have a spot on your clothes, apply a drop or two of this soap, let it stand for an hour or so and then wash as usual. I have found no stain which will not come out. And, this is the only laundry soap that does not affect my allergies and skin rashes. If you are allergic to soaps, this is wonderful to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stain Remover
customer_reviews.text: We had purchase this while awaiting out regular detergent to come back in stock. This product was a great substitute. It is biodegradable, works for H.E. washers, and last longer than it looks. It had also taken a ketchup stain that had been saturating a blouse for three days while in a hot car sitting in 100* weather, in under a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottle AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: The bag the bottle came in was ripped; likely from the pump. The cap was loose, and finally the seal under the cap was leaking as well. All three failed. Happened once, thought it was a fluke. Detergent seems decent enough. A couple shipments later: boom another leaky bottle.
customer_reviews.author: ojuice

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly & packaged well. Love the Puracy line of products. It's better than all those chemicals. I would buy this again & recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K.

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: So, I loved this detergent. It works great. But it was not hypoallergenic for me. I managed to be allergic to something in it. I have a ton of environmental allergies and eczema so it is not the fault of this detergent. But just as a warning.
customer_reviews.author: Beth De Santis

customer_reviews.title: Liked the idea of it
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work for me. I dont have heavily soiled clothes but my clothes did not look or feel clean after washing...going to try Mollys Suds and eco nuts
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and product. I am sensitive to smells, so I love that this has no smell, and I also love the high quality ingredients. Great stuff, I've already bought more.
customer_reviews.author: ELynn

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be the best so far
customer_reviews.text: I've used this laundry soap for several loads now and it seems to be the best natural, non-toxic product I've used so far! It seems to get the ground-in dirt out of my baby's clothes after crawling around on the floor all the time. I kept trying different brands of natural soap with pretty dingy results. Nothing ever seems to get my whites back to white. I do like having the soap in a pump also (only one hand necessary!) and the fact that it is concentrated.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Higgins

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I previously wrote a review about the pump leaking. The company sent me an email immediately, apologized and explained the pump must've been defective and offered a replacement. I love all these products and this company's customer service is the best. I can't figure out how to update my original review, but I'm hoping this one sets my last 3 star one off. Thanks for being a great company! The product is great. I have an HE machine and a home water softener and one load only takes half a pump so this lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Solved our baby's eczema!  Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews.... But in case other parents struggling with baby eczema need ideas, I decided to write this. This is the only detergent I found that stopped our baby's eczema issues. She developed horrible eczema from head to toe around 5 months. We changed foods, soaps, detergents everything. Didn't matter if we used baby "friendly" detergent. Finally did some more research and read about the difference of chemical enzymes for cleaning vs plant-based enzymes. We tried this-- and her eczema cleared up within 2 weeks. (Plus it cleans really well). I know this is still a small Austin company.... So I hope they keep making it!
customer_reviews.author: Max Rey

customer_reviews.title: Impressive and much less wasteful than other detergents
customer_reviews.text: I do not like artificial scents or chemical based detergents. I do about 2-3 loads of laundry every two weeks in a H.E. washer and one bottle has lasted me an entire year. Clothes are clean, scent free, and hopefully much less environmental detriment.
customer_reviews.author: Proctor X

customer_reviews.title: Amazing natural laundry soap!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Tide user all my life. Decided to go natural so we started looking for a plant based product. This is definitely a great find! Would recommend it to everyone. 2 small pumps into my washer and away it goes. No strange smell, just clean. Will be added to my subscribe and save list for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This cleans very well. A drop works well to pretreat a stain. Smells clean. A pump will do a large load of laundry. Would like to see this with a refill option.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: this is much better for the environment and the conscience and it does ...
customer_reviews.text: So...this is much better for the environment and the conscience and it does clean clothes. However, it's not the MIRACLE detergent that some reviews state. It doesn't clean or remove stains any better than any other detergent. So if you want a detergent option that is better for your health and the environment, this is a good option. Just don't expect any miracles, it's just laundry detergent!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent laundry detergent. I was happy to discover that their recommendation of "two pumps per load" was accurate and means that I will get close to 100 loads out of this 24 oz bottle. This is a large cost savings over other HE detergents. I also appreciate the "ingredient" list on the package and that Puracy has offered a layperson explanation of that list. Product is made in USA (Austin), yet another plus. I will continue to purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: juleswalls

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The detergent worked well overall. It did struggle to get out some heavy grease stains though. I enjoyed how it made the clothes feel and smell. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lute

customer_reviews.title: Made my laundry smell terrible
customer_reviews.text: My laundry smelled so gross after using this. Didn't matter if my clothes air dried or were put in the dryer, they smelled terrible. I thought it was just me, but my husband thought the smell was gross too. Before anyone says I used too much/too little, we used the recommended number of pumps for our type of washer.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle and Teri Prax

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is organic
customer_reviews.text: I don't really understand the high reviews. I like that it is organic, but even with 4 squirts it didn't get any smells, stains, or even pieces of food off clothes. I have two young kids, so it's noticeable when a detergent does or does not work. This, unfortunately, did not.
customer_reviews.author: apennyfor

customer_reviews.title: Not great on messes and stains
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this to work since I love their other products but really doesn’t work on tougher messes that my basic or other natural detergent can take care of. I ran a load through twice and still didn’t take care of stains like baby drool/ spit up. Might work for simpler loads but won’t be using anymore.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this has no harsh chemical and dyes in it. I got the Free and Clear "scent" which has no scent at all. No perfume smell. It took a bit of getting use to, clothes having no smell, but it is good. I think I will try the Linen scent next time. It suds up as the other detergents do and does a wonderful job cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: I am really pleased with how clean my clothes smell and feel using ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle arrived open and absolutely covered in a film of detergent inside the plastic packaging. It took me several minutes to finally be able the rinse it away. That said, I am really pleased with how clean my clothes smell and feel using this detergent, and I also really like the pump dispenser. Shipping/packaging was unsatisfactory, but all in all a great product!
customer_reviews.author: M Fo

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Simple Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: Clean and pure laundry soap. My laundry is clean after using this. It is great for people with sensitive skin or allergies. I like to add a little essential oil to my laundry to pick a scent to add to this detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Hetta Quade

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have very sensitive skin. So far, this product has not caused any discomfort at all. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good detergent but defective bottles
customer_reviews.text: I like the detergent itself, it works well but this is the second bottle that I bought that some sort of hole or crack in the bottom so the detergent leaks out all over my counter. I thought the first one was a fluke but then the second one I ordered did the same thing. Kinda disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Pantalone

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfect for my 2 month old who has EXTREMELY sensitive skin. Will continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: madi tank

customer_reviews.title: Soft and delicate skin
customer_reviews.text: Smells very fresh and delicate. After spending hours researching no chemical body soaps, I decided to go with Puracy. My first purchase was the laundry detergent for my baby which I love, that's why I decided to rely on Puracy again. I love their products and will definitely buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ana S.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the odors out
customer_reviews.text: This detergent works very well for neutralizing odors such as urine and other proteins that get stuck on clothes. I have found that two pumps in HE washers does not quite seem to be enough though. I've been using 3 pumps for an average load or pre-treating the problem areas and everything turns out pretty good. This has been much more effective than using standard store detergents when dealing with soiled clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Rich M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! Really cleans our clothes without causing irritation. Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great for delicates
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy this mild detergent for our sheets and delicates!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Phanichkul

customer_reviews.title: but I always hated that it was a petroleum product
customer_reviews.text: We've used All Free and Clear for years, but I always hated that it was a petroleum product. This is reasonably priced and goes a long way. I also feel that the cleaning powered is at least equivalent if not better. It is simple, but the pump dispenser is really handy and keeps things clean.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: I really like that it's liquid and gentle
customer_reviews.text: I've used about 1/2 a bottle so far - alternating between this and another natural (but powder) laundry soap. I really like that it's liquid and gentle. My sheets and bath towels go in with this soap and come out clean. My skin seems to appreciate the lack of chemicals found in so many laundry soaps, even those saying 'natural' Thank you for a really good product.
customer_reviews.author: JB FL

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent, gets odors out
customer_reviews.text: This detergent works very well. You do not need very much to wash a load of laundry, so the bottle of this size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Syeda

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that tis detergent is concentrated and is in pump form. It gets my clothes as clean as Tide did, no residues or weird smells - I will keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Plain Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning, less expensive per load
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well. Leaves very little accumulation in our HE washer; it calls for cleaning far less often than it did with other detergents. Much less expensive per load. Follow the instructions, a little goes as far as they claim.
customer_reviews.author: Bill from 336

customer_reviews.title: I will buy it again for sure...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I am very sensitive to laundry detergent and other cleaning products. This works well and it is lasting a while, you only use two pumps. It's hard to believe but a.little goes a long way. So far I am very happy with Puracy products. I have the body wash and it has a very light scent that does not give me a headache and it is lasting quite a while. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: A.lee

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best [natural] detergent I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best [natural] detergent I've ever used. A little goes a long way, I only need a couple pumps to wash a decent-sized load of smelly, gross laundry. Everything always comes out clean and completely odor-free. Works well in both hot & cold water, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hildenbrand

customer_reviews.title: My problem with this detergent is it says to use ...
customer_reviews.text: My problem with this detergent is it says to use half the amount for an HE washer. Not because an HE washer doesn't need the extra soap but because HE washers use less water so you want less suds. Stay away from any detergent that has you use less for an HE washer :(
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t remove stain & clothes don’t smell clean
customer_reviews.text: Even when using again sticks and sprays, clothes still come out dirty. Also, it’s unscented but the clothes just don’t smell clean - especially my husbands extra dirty workout clothes. Even with doing a prewash, this doesn’t work well for us.
customer_reviews.author: adam

product_meta.title: Puracy Natural Liquid Laundry Detergent, Hypoallergenic, Enzyme-Based, Free & Clear, 24 Ounce (96 Loads)
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Free & Clear| Size:24 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Puracy Natural 10x liquid laundry detergent is the most concentrated laundry detergent on the market. Using plant-based enzymes and natural cleansers, this high efficiency formula requires just 1/4 ounce per load, which reduces waste by more than 80%. the Biodegradable elements were carefully chosen and developed into a premium cleanser by Puracy, a trusted source for all natural, plant-based, child & pet safe, hypoallergenic, and effective household Essentials. Developed by doctors for those with sensitive skin, The head-to-head tests have proven our proprietary blend of plant-based enzymes and natural minerals can clean as well as the synthetic brands, all while being a gentle and renewable solution. Our 10x formula will quickly dislodge stains, eliminate odors, remove residues, and leave your laundry naturally soft and fresh. This product is 99.96% natural, per Puracy's "what natural means to us" definition available on our website.
feature_bullets: Clean clothes, less waste: you can now have clean laundry and reduce Waste (less plastic, water, and energy; accurate dosing) using safe, plant-powered ingredients
Proven performance: best liquid detergent on Amazon, based on customer review rating
Created by doctors: for sensitive skin & Allergy sufferers. No sulfates (SLS, SLES, SCS), bleach, or toxic chemicals
Safe & Effective Plant-Powered Formula: Use on delicate & Dark clothing, microfiber towels, cloth diapers, septic & greywater systems
No harsh chemicals: no phosphates, sulfates, petrochemicals, animal by-products, chlorine, perfumes, gluten, tree nut-based ingredients, dyes, allergens
Made in the USA, Never tested on animals, 100% Satisfaction GUARANTEED OR YOUR money back

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
